CAREERS WITH GPS

Grandton is one of the most exciting and diverse cities in the world – and policing it is no easy task. It takes a huge number of people from all sorts of different backgrounds with a wide range of skills and experience. Do you have what it takes to be one of them? Find out if a career with the GPS is just the change you’re looking for, and what kind of challenges, experiences and rewards you could have in store.

Pick up more information or an application from your local police station, and find out if you have what it takes to keep Grandton safe.

The material provided is for educational purposes only. Whilst the material in this eLearning has been carefully prepared by the authors, it is an example and not tailored to or based on any particular case or individual. It may be used as a guide but it is not a substitute for current guidelines/evidence and expert opinion in relation to decision making in professional practice.
